title: FeaturePack
description: Metadata record for a feature pack (HDF5 containing mel + embeddings)

computed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this feature pack was computed

feature_spec_alias.description: Short stable alias (first 12 chars of sha256(feature_spec_id))

embedding_model_id.description: Identifier of the embedding model (e.g., yamnet)

embedding_model_hash.description: SHA256 hash of the model file with prefix

hdf5_uri.description: URI to the HDF5 file (e.g., data/features/{asset_id}.{alias}.h5)

mel_shape.description: Shape of the mel spectrogram array [time, mel_bins]

embedding_shape.description: Shape of the embedding array [time, embedding_dim]

sample_rate.description: Sample rate used for feature extraction

mel_hop_samples.description: Hop length in samples for mel spectrogram

embedding_hop_sec.description: Hop length in seconds for embedding extraction
